subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The growing rivalry between No. 7 Oklahoma State and No. 8 Texas A&M will most likely be uprooted amid the Big 12 drama, making Saturday’s game perhaps the last meeting between the teams.
snippet: The growing rivalry between No. 7 Oklahoma State and No. 8 Texas A&M will most likely be uprooted amid the Big 12 drama, making Saturday’s game perhaps the last meeting between the teams.
